content.rendered:
Our Ecuadorian pink roses exude romance and classic elegance. Each rose petal is carefully reflexed to create an exquisite full appearance. When arranged in a vase, their impressive and timeless elegance demands attention.

Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon OR with the option to add a contemporary ‘Marmoset Found‘ vase.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The pink roses you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest pink roses to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
